Name: denture stomatitis
Definition: A leprosy that is an early form of the disease which causes one to a few hypopigmented or erythematous macules.

Name: aphthous stomatitis
Definition: A stomatitis characterized by the repeated formation of benign and non-contagious mouth ulcers.

Name: ulcerative stomatitis
Definition: A cataract that is characterized by thickening and loss of transparency of the lens with age progression
